alert.note: Alert for Lafayette; Vermilion (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 04 at 7:22PM CST until February 10 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana... Vermilion River At Lafayette, Surrey Street Gage Calcasieu River Near Oberlin Calcasieu River Near Kinder Calcasieu River Near Glenmora Calcasieu River near White Oak Park Bayou Nezpique Near Basile Mermentau River Near Mermentau Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Vermilion River At Lafayette, Surrey Street Gage. * WHEN...Until early Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Minor flooding of Heymann Park off of Highway 90 will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:15 PM CST Saturday the stage was 10.6 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 6:15 PM CST Saturday was 10.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early Thursday afternoon and continue falling to 9.9 feet Thursday evening. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Vermilion River Lafayette, Surrey Street Gag 10.0 10.6 Sat 6 pm CST 10.4 10.3 10. 1 &&
